titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 1066) to restore Federal services to the Pokagon Band of Potawatomi Indians.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-648, by Mr. Hall (OH).

Rule provides for consideration of S. 1066 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered except motion to recommit. Measure will be read by section. Bill is open to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 201.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 8/1/1994--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of S. 1066 (restoring Federal services to the Pokagon Band of Potawatomi Indians.)
